mention.text: former Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc. high-yield bond chief Michael Milken
Milken , 44 , who has been accused , among other things , of helping to bring on the national savings and loan disaster

Milken , who joined Drexel while still in business school in 1969 , plucked junk bonds from obscurity and almost single-handedly built what at Drexel peak became a $ 200-billion market From Drexel 's junk bond headquarters in Beverly Hills , Milken orchestrated transactions that made possible huge leveraged buyouts of such companies as Storer Communications and Beatrice Cos.
U.S. District Judge Kimba M. Wood
U.S. District Judge Kimba M. Wood
employees who you supervised to assist you in violating the law are serious crimes warranting serious punishment
